name: Mirror Teleporter
description:
Hello There!!

This game is made for Weekly Game Jam 148. The theme was "MIRROR".

This game is about teleporting through mirrors, fighting monsters and saving the villagers. Donate me if you like the game.

You can also check my website for more interesting games!!                                                         hussainsaifsgamecorner.blogspot.com  

#WeeklyGameJam #WGJGame
